mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ(FAQ_seq, FAQ_bigsort, FAQ_smallsort, FAQ_ask, FAQ_answer, FAQ_file, FAQ_passwd) VALUES (null, #{FAQ_bigsort}, #{FAQ_smallsort}, #{FAQ_ask}, #{FAQ_answer}, #{FAQ_fileName}, #{FAQ_passwd})
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_bigsort=#{FAQ_bigsort}, FAQ_smallsort=#{FAQ_smallsort}, FAQ_ask=#{FAQ_ask}, FAQ_file=#{FAQ_fileName}, FAQ_answer=#{FAQ_answer} WHERE FAQ_seq = #{FAQ_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_seq = #{FAQ_seq} AND FAQ_passwd = #{FAQ_passwd}
